DOC.brief_summary: The trial is conducted in Asia. The aim of the trial is to evaluate the effect of insulin detemir on blood glucose control in Taiwanese patients with type 2 diabetes failing on OAD with/without once-daily NPH Insulin treatment.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Insulin Detemir on Blood Glucose Control in Taiwanese Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Failing on OAD
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes HbA1C: 7.011.0% Previous diabetes treatment for at least 6 months BMI max. 35 kg/m2 Treatment with an oral antidiabetic drug (OAD) Type 1 diabetes Receipt of any investigational drug within the last three months prior to this trial
